document.full_text: autonomy's "aurasma," an augmented reality application, demonstrates how life might end up imitating science fiction. it embeds moving imagery within the world itself, transforming what you see in a way that's visually convincing.
document.title: augmented reality comes closer to reality
lines_and_colors: autonomy's "aurasma," an augmented reality application, demonstrates how life might end up imitating science fiction. it embeds moving imagery within the world itself, transforming what you see in a way that's visually convincing.
